page.title: 11TOURISM IN CHEDDAR
page.content: The{tourist industry}is very big in Cheddar.Loads of tourists come to Cheddar every year so many that the tourist industry provides the main income for many people.To cope with all this there are plenty of{bed and {breakfast}places and licensed hotels.Tourists love Cheddar for{the {gorge, the cheese, the friendly people and the{relaxed atmosphere.}The friendly atmosphere of Cheddar makes it a beautiful place but we must not forget the business side of things. There are plenty of shops in Cheddar to cope with everyones needs plus lots of{souvenir shops}in the gorge.As for car parks well you might have guessed there would be loads of them and you're right!{The Gorge}is probably the main attraction, a beautiful site carved many millions of years ago.
